name: appstruction
description: Estimate cement pouring jobs with ease.
author: C4 Tech and Design

scripts.compile: npm run prepare-phonegap && npm run phonegap
scripts.phonegap: phonegap prepare android && phonegap build android
scripts.prepare: npm run prepare-node && npm run prepare-bower
scripts.prepare-dev: npm run prepare-node-dev && npm run prepare-bower-dev
scripts.start: npm run prepare && npm run build
scripts.start-dev: npm run prepare-dev && npm run build-dev
scripts.start-over: npm run torch && npm run start-dev
scripts.test: npm run serve && npm run mocha
scripts.update: npm run update-node && npm run update-bower
scripts.update-dev: npm run update-node-dev && npm run update-bower-dev
scripts.update-build: npm run update && npm run build
scripts.update-build-dev: npm run update-dev && npm run build-dev
